title: Leading European city tourism destinations in 2018 , by number of bednights
summary: This is a bar chart representing European City Destination in the x axis and Number of bednights in millions in the y axis.
The Number of bednights in millions is highest at European City Destination London and lowest at European City Destination Lisbon.
The highest European City Destination London has 60.4 more Number of bednights in millions than the lowest European City Destination Lisbon.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing European City Destination in the x axis and Number of bednights in millions in the y axis.
European City Destination London has the highest Number of bednights in millions and Lisbon has the lowest Number of bednights in millions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing European City Destination in the x axis and Number of bednights in millions in the y axis.
The Number of bednights in millions is highest at European City Destination London and lowest at European City Destination Lisbon.
The highest European City Destination London has 60.4 more Number of bednights in millions than the lowest European City Destination Lisbon.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing European City Destination in the x axis and Number of bednights in millions in the y axis.
The Number of bednights in millions is appeared to be the highest at European City Destination London and lowest at European City Destination Lisbon.
The second highest Number of bednights in millions is appeared to be the European City Destination Paris.
There is a difference of 60.4 between the maximum European City Destination London and minimum European City Destination Lisbon.

European City Destination London is higher than any other European City Destinations with value 71.16, followed by Paris, and Berlin. Down to European City Destination Lisbon with the lowest value 10.76.
The lowest value 10.76 at Lisbon is almost 2.91 times smaller than the average value 24.47.
Summing up the values of all European City Destinations, we get total 367.12.
